vrydag.copy: Thursday is a public holiday, so if you want to spend a nice long weekend with us - take leave! You can check into your accommodation from 12:00 onwards. If you can only come through after work, please note that the pre-wedding event starts at 17:00, so please try be here before then. Although we're in the Karoo, we'll still be enjoying Heidelberg lamb.

saterdag.copy: The big day. Breakfast starts is from 08:00 to 10:00 in the hotel dining room. Keep yourself busy with all the activities that Matjiesfontein has to offer, but make sure to be dressed and ready for the ceremony that will start, strictly, at 15:00.

sondag.copy: Take a dip in the pool to wash off that hangover. Breakfast starts again from 08:00 - 10:00. Have a safe journey back, and thank you for attending our special weekend.

successfulRsvp: Thanks, we are very excited to celebrate our big day with you!
unSuccessfulRsvp: Thanks for letting us know. We're very sad we won't be able to celebrate our big day with you.

faq.question: When is the wedding?
faq.answer: Our wedding will take place over the entire weekend of the 22nd to the 24th of March

faq.question: Where in Matjiesfontein is the wedding taking place?
faq.answer: Our guests will be taking over the entire Matjiesfontein for the weekend, and the wedding events will take place at different locactions around Matjiesfontein

faq.question: What time do we need to be there on Friday
faq.answer: Our first event starts at 17:00 on Friday in front of the Lord Milner Hotel

faq.question: Can we come earlier on Friday?
faq.answer: Thursday is a public holiday, and if you would like to take an extra long weekend we would love our guests to come through early on Friday to spend the day with us

faq.question: What time can we check-in on Friday and check-out on Sunday?
faq.answer: Guests can check in on Friday from 11:00 and should check out by 11:00 on Sunday.

faq.question: Where do we check-in on Friday?
faq.answer: Guests need to check-in at the reception of the Hotel where they will get their room keys

faq.question: Where do we eat breakfast, and from what time?
faq.answer: Breakfast is served in the Hotel dining room, and is available from 8:00 until 10:00 each morning. Guests do not have to pay for breakfast as it is included in their room price

faq.question: What time do we need to be ready for the wedding on Saturday?
faq.answer: Guests need to be ready in front of the Hotel by 2:00 PM for the wedding on Saturday.

faq.question: Will there be a cash bar?
faq.answer: There is a cash bar on the Friday and Saturday night, but there are card facilities available.
